page.title: 03ROESMELLIN SCHOOL CAMBORNE
page.content: {Rosmellin school}was opened on 7/9/1976. It has{326 pupils}between the ages of 4 & 11 (to go to either Pool or Camborne secondary schools, depending on the vicinity they live in.) There is only one disabled child in the school, a deaf girl. There are {11 classrooms & 12 teachers}including MR Jelbert, the headmaster.There is a school uniform of white, blue & grey. The subjects taught include English, Maths, Geography & History. The children partake in various sports. They go on many excursions. Other facilities include;a library, a kiln, computers, O.H.P.'s, projector, a language master, a tape recorder & a camera. There are few school rules but unruly behaviour is not allowed. Punishments include loss of playtime or swimming lessons.
